00087 //  Class name : NT_rnd_dist_o

00095 class NT_rnd_dist_o : NT_o {
00096 public:
00097   NT_rnd_dist_o();
00098   NT_rnd_dist_o(NTint dim);
00099   NT_rnd_dist_o(const NT_rnd_dist_o &);
00100   ~NT_rnd_dist_o();
00101 
00102   virtual NTreal RndVal() const = 0;
00103   //  NTreal NT_rnd_dist_o();
00104   // NT_vector_o NT_rnd_dist_o();
00105   
00106   NTreal _mean() const   { return mean; };          
00107   NTreal _variance() const   { return variance; };          
00108   
00109   friend ostream & operator<<(ostream & os, const NT_rnd_dist_o & self);
00110 
00111 protected:
00112   float uniformQuickDirty() const;
00113   float uniform1() const;
00114   float uniformMT() const { return randgen.rand(); }
00115    // 2DO: seed has to be mutexed !
00116   NTreal mean;
00117   NTreal variance;
00118 private:
00119   static MTRand randgen;
00120   static long seed;
00121 };
